contact_add_explain: Add a new contact by scanning their QR or by pasting their key below.
contact_error_yourself: You cannot add yourself as a contact.
contact_error_key: This is not a valid key.
contact_delete_text: Are you sure you want to delete {name} from your contacts?
onboarding_text: Get automatic updates from your Bitkit contacts, pay them, and follow their public profiles.
onboarding_profile1_text: Control your public profile and links, so your Bitkit contacts can reach you or pay you anytime, anywhere.
onboarding_profile2_text: You and your contacts can use Bitkit to send payments directly, without banks, anytime, anywhere.
onboarding_widgets1_text: Experience the web without passwords. Use Bitkit to sign in to your favorite web services, right from a widget.
onboarding_widgets2_text: Enjoy decentralized feeds from your favorite web services, by adding fun and useful widgets to your Bitkit wallet.
profile_public_warn: Please note that all your profile information will be publicly available and visible.
profile_bio: Short bio. Say a bit about yourself.
profile_link_public: Note: Any link you add will be publicly visible.
widget_edit_description: Please select which fields you want to display in the {name} widget.
widget_delete_desc: Are you sure you want to delete ‘{name}‘ from your widgets?
error_sdk_msg: An essential component is not working properly. Please restart Bitkit.
error_pay_empty_msg: There is no payment data available for this contact.
auth_depricated_msg: Slashauth is deprecated. Please use Bitkit Beta.
